short_description: formula bathrooms is a plumbing supply store based in merthyr tydfil, united kingdom.
long_description: we are the largest bathroom distributor in wales and one of the uk's leading distributors to the bathroom retail and merchant trade. established in 1932, we have a comprehensive range from some of the leading bathroom manufacturers in the uk alongside our extensive own-brand ranges. our portfolio includes full ranges from kudos, mx-group, oceana, tavistock and trojan baths.
generated_description: formula bathrooms is a leading bathroom distributor in wales and one of the uk's top retailers to the bathroom retail and merchant trade. established in 1932, the company offers a comprehensive range of bathroom products from some of the leading manufacturers in the uk, including kudos, mx-group, oceana, tavistock, and trojan baths. formula bathrooms provides a variety of products such as enclosures, wetroom glass, sanitaryware, furniture, modular ranges, showers, heating solutions, and various bathroom accessories. the company caters to both traditional and contemporary styles, ensuring a wide range of options to suit different tastes and budgets.
